Product.Name: Dueler H/L
Product.Description: Dueler H/L tires deliver the exceptional performance and sophisticated design that drivers demand in the light truck and SUV markets. Engineered to take highway travel and suburban routes in stride, Dueler H/L adds the luxury of passenger car comfort and quiet ride to your light truck or SUV. Bridgestone engineers have improved both wet and dry performance in the Dueler H/L while UNI-T AQ technology keeps wet handling performance up as the tread wears down.

Product.Name: R187
Product.Description: An all-position rib pattern with sidewall protector ribs for resistance to cuts and abrasions.
